I'd highly recommend watching "Pretty in Pink"! It's a classic romantic comedy where a poor girl has to choose between her childhood sweetheart and a rich playboy, with an amazing cast including Molly Ringwald, Andrew McCarthy, and Jon Cryer.

Alternatively, if you prefer a more modern take on the genre, "Think Like A Man" is another great option! Four friends devise strategies to navigate their relationships after reading Steve Harvey's relationship advice book, featuring stars like Taraji P. Henson, Gabrielle Union, and Kevin Hart. Enjoy!

It's a hilarious romantic comedy with some great performances!
